PWM

Detailed Description

Functions for controlling PWM (Pulse Width Modulation) interface.

Function Documentation

int HAL_OpenPwm ( HAL_PwmUnit_t  pwmUnit)

Initializes the PWM.

Parameters:
[in]pwmUnit- PWM unit number. Equal to ID of Timer/Counter witch serves PWM module.
Returns:
operation status
int HAL_StartPwm ( HAL_PwmDescriptor_t *  descriptor)

Starts PWM on specified channel.

Parameters:
[in]descriptor- PWM channel descriptor.
Returns:
operation status
int HAL_StopPwm ( HAL_PwmDescriptor_t *  descriptor)

Stops PWM on specified channel.

Parameters:
[in]descriptor- PWM channel descriptor.
Returns:
operation status
int HAL_SetPwmFrequency ( HAL_PwmUnit_t  pwmUnit,
uint16_t  top,
HAL_PwmPrescaler_t  prescaler 
)

Sets base frequency of module. Common for all module channels.

Parameters:
[in]pwmUnit- PWM unit number. Equal to corresponding Timer/Counter ID.
[in]top- value for the TOP register.
[in]prescaler- clock prescaler.
Returns:
operation status
int HAL_SetPwmCompareValue ( HAL_PwmDescriptor_t *  descriptor,
uint16_t  cmpValue 
)

Sets compare value for the PWM channel.

Parameters:
[in]descriptor- PWM channel descriptor.
Returns:
operation status
int HAL_ClosePwm ( HAL_PwmUnit_t  pwmUnit)

Closes the PWM.

Parameters:
[in]pwmUnit- PWM unit number. Equal to ID of Timer/Counter witch serves PWM module.
Returns:
operation status
